file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 12-12-01-03 - ENGINE - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ENGINE - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the engine oil servicing. B. The engine oil system is serviced as necessary. The oil that is used to service the engine must be in the table of approved oils given in AMM MPP 20-30-02/200. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 12-12-01-600-801-A ENGINE - SERVICING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 12-12-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 12-12-01-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE - SERVICING A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to replenish the engine oil tanks. The oil that is used to service the engine must be in the table of approved oils given in AMM MPP 20-30-02/200. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-43-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM MPP 20-30-02/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 413BB Cowling door, LH 423 423BB Cowling door, RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To give access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-PRF-23699STD, MIL-PRF-23699HTS Engine oil AR or MIL-PRF-7808 G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-12-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, open the START 1 and START 2 circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them. WARNING: DO NOT OPEN OR KEEP ENGINE ACCESS DOORS OPEN IF THE WIND IS MORE THAN 50 KNOTS. (2) Open access door 413BB of the LH engine and access door 423BB of the RH engine ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100). J. Engine Oil - Servicing SUBTASK 610-002-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close the START 1 and START 2 circuit breakers. (2) Close access door 413BB of the LH engine and access door 423BB of the RH engine ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100).
